tagline: Building Strong Foundations for a Brighter Future
about: Born from Pi Square Coaching Centre, NEEV Foundation is committed to providing quality education to students in Haldwani. With experienced faculty and personalized attention, we help students achieve their academic goals.

contact.address: Do Naharia, near Dr Saun Child Clinic, Durgesh Colony, Shiv Puri, Haldwani, Uttarakhand 263139

hero.headline: Quality Education with Personal Attention
hero.subtext: Small batches, experienced faculty & proven teaching methods.
